title: Too much time to response (Client problem or computer problem)
body:
Good Morning,

Im here to ask you, as developers of the alpha client, that by testing the alpha for the first time, i couldn't move very well. e.g : when i click play, the client processes during long time, sometime freezes for an good 10 min before responding.

there is any hardware min required or its animation consuming a lot of threads?

thanking you in advance, 
André Rocha (CG SaintBekas){{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
If you feel the animations are slowing you down a lot you can turn them off in settings (up next to the exit button). The alpha client is a little slow atm, in part due to the need to interface with the old client, but more often that will affect things like lobbies and chat loading times more than simply pressing play.

If turning off animations doesn't work I'd probably recommend running a client repair which can be done in settings under the "GENERAL" tab.

I'm afraid I don't know what the min requirements are, but the new client is optimised better than the old one, so if you could run the old client with no problems you shouldn't be having this much trouble with the alpha client.
